nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.View

Class EdgeFollowingViewport

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.View.Viewport
      • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.View.FollowingViewport
        • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.View.EdgeFollowingViewport

  • public class EdgeFollowingViewport
extends FollowingViewport
    This class allows following an GameObject in the Viewport. The viewport will move if the followed GameObject reaches the side of the viewport minus the given tolerance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EdgeFollowingViewport(GameObject followedObject, int zoomWidth, int zoomHeight)
      Create a new EdgeFollowingViewport.
      EdgeFollowingViewport(GameObject followedObject, int zoomWidth, int zoomHeight, double xOffset, double yOffset)
      Create a new EdgeFollowingViewport.

      The method which is called to cut out an image of the drawn world.

      • Methods inherited from class nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.View.FollowingViewport

    • Constructor Detail

      • EdgeFollowingViewport

        public EdgeFollowingViewport(GameObject followedObject,
                             int zoomWidth,
                             int zoomHeight,
                             double xOffset,
                             double yOffset)
        Create a new EdgeFollowingViewport.
        Parameters:
        followedObject - The GameObject the Viewport is following.
        zoomWidth - The width in pixels which the viewPort will cut out of the world.
        zoomHeight - The height in pixels which the viewPort will cut out of the world.
        xOffset - The distance in pixels on the x axis where the center of the followed object is from the center of the Viewport
        yOffset - The distance in pixels on the y axis where the center of the followed object is from the center of the Viewport

      • EdgeFollowingViewport

        public EdgeFollowingViewport(GameObject followedObject,
                             int zoomWidth,
                             int zoomHeight)
        Create a new EdgeFollowingViewport.
        Parameters:
        followedObject - The GameObject the Viewport is following.
        zoomWidth - The width in pixels which the viewPort will cut out of the world.
        zoomHeight - The height in pixels which the viewPort will cut out of the world.

    • Method Detail

      • createImage

        public processing.core.PImage createImage(processing.core.PGraphics worldGraphics)
        The method which is called to cut out an image of the drawn world.
        Overrides:
        createImage in class Viewport
        Parameters:
        worldGraphics - The canvas which represents the world from which the viewPort will cut its image out of.
        Returns:
        The cut out image of the world.
